generated_body: If the user clicks on the article titled "This was uglier than a brawl. And Myles Garrett deserves suspension for rest of year after helmet attack," they are likely to read an analysis of the recent incident involving NFL player Myles Garrett, focusing on the implications of his actions during a game.
